name.baseName: Aluminum electrolysis ; Liquid primary aluminum ; Prebaking ; Alumina for metallurgy ; 2009
铝电解 ; 液态原铝 ; 预焙 ; 冶金用氧化铝 ; 2009年

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The aluminum electrolysis process described herein is utilized for the production of liquid primary aluminum through the prebaking method. This liquid primary aluminum is specifically intended for use in metallurgy. The data set corresponding to this process is relevant for applications that involve casting, refining, and further fabrication of aluminum products. It encompasses industrial operations such as the creation of aluminum alloys, components for the automotive industry, construction materials, and aerospace parts that require metallurgical grade aluminum.
本文描述的铝电解工艺用于通过预焙方法生产液态原铝。该液态原铝专门用于冶金。该数据集与涉及铸造、精炼和进一步制造铝制品的应用相关。它包括工业操作，如铝合金的创建、汽车工业的组件、建筑材料和需要冶金级铝的航空航天部件。

technology.technologicalApplicability: The aluminum electrolysis process described herein is utilized for the production of liquid primary aluminum through the prebaking method. This liquid primary aluminum is specifically intended for use in metallurgy. The data set corresponding to this process is relevant for applications that involve casting, refining, and further fabrication of aluminum products. It encompasses industrial operations such as the creation of aluminum alloys, components for the automotive industry, construction materials, and aerospace parts that require metallurgical grade aluminum.
本文描述的铝电解工艺用于通过预焙方法生产液态原铝。该液态原铝专门用于冶金。该数据集与涉及铸造、精炼和进一步制造铝制品的应用相关。它包括工业操作，如铝合金的创建、汽车工业的组件、建筑材料和需要冶金级铝的航空航天部件。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: The data in this study refers to the LCA data of PA, SA, electricity, and other background data. The PA data were obtained from statistical data sources, and the SA data were mainly obtained from the literatures. The background data were mainly derived from the Chinese localization LCA database CAS RCEES 2018, which was established by the Research Center for Eco-Environmental Sciences, Chinese Academy of Sciences and covers LCA data for energy, materials, transportation, waste management etc.
本研究的数据参考了PA、SA、电力等背景数据的LCA数据。PA数据来自统计数据源，SA数据主要来自文献。背景数据主要来自中国科学院生态环境研究中心CASRCEES 2018建立的中国本地化LCA数据库，涵盖能源、材料、交通、废物管理等LCA数据。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Ding, N., Liu, N., Lu, B. & Yang, J. Life cycle greenhouse gas emissions of aluminum based on regional industrial transfer in China. J. Ind. Ecol. 25, 1657–1672 (2021).
Ding, N., Liu, N., Lu, B. & Yang, J. Life cycle greenhouse gas emissions of aluminum based on regional industrial transfer in China. J. Ind. Ecol. 25, 1657–1672 (2021).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When using this dataset for Life Cycle Assessment (LCA), practitioners need to ensure that the technological scope corresponds to the prebaking aluminum electrolysis technology and its use in metallurgy. It is important to pay attention to the temporal relevance of the data, as it represents practices and efficiencies from the year 2009. Users should also be aware that the primary aluminum (PA) data was sourced from statistical data, secondary aluminum (SA) data from literature, and background data from the CAS RCEES 2018 Chinese localization LCA database. Adjustments may be needed to reflect current practices or local conditions. It is also essential to understand the geographical context (China) and adapt the data accordingly when applying it to other regions.

在使用该数据集进行生命周期评估（LCA）时，从业者需要确保技术范围与预焙铝电解技术及其在冶金中的使用相对应。注意数据的时间相关性也很重要，因为它代表了2009年的实践和效率。用户还应了解，原铝（PA）数据来源于统计数据，再生铝（SA）数据主要来源于文献，背景数据则来自中国科学院生态环境研究中心（CAS RCEES）2018年建立的中国本地化LCA数据库。在反映当前实践或本地条件时可能需要进行调整。理解地理背景（中国）并在将数据应用到其他地区时相应地适应数据也是至关重要的。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
